messages.title: This is our chance for change
messages.content: Only Karen Chilvers and the Lib Dems are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats are the only party that will fight to keep Britain in the heart of Europe. Here in Brentwood and Ongar, it's vital to stop the Conservatives' hard Brexit that threatens local jobs and our economy.
The Liberal Democrats will fight to protect the future of local health services. Karen believes that we must protect investment in the NHS, and plans to increase funding for health and care services.
The Conservatives plan to cut funding to local schools, with £75,971 of cuts. Karen Chilvers will fight to stop any such cuts.

issues.brexitEurope: Karen Chilvers and the Lib Dems are fighting to give you the final say on the Brexit deal.

community.content: The Liberal Democrats are the only party that will fight to keep Britain in the heart of Europe.

contactInformation.address: The Blue House, Doddinghurst Road, Doddinghurst, Brentwood, Essex, CM15 0SS
